headline: Simon-Peter
description: A dialogue in the Golden Glade with the apostle Simon Peter. Aleksandr prays, reflects on sacrifice, pride, and humility, and hears Peter’s words on wounds, faith, and feeding the sheep. A meditation on being called a fool, carrying scars as proof of survival, and walking the patient road of truth before God.
resonantThread: Golden Glade dialogues with apostles and witnesses of faith

motifMap.meaning: daily cost, humility, proof of survival
clarity, tide of faith pulling to sea
